thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Champs Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend break
thread.title_full: Weekend break - Review of Mercure Paris Champs Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: neil_dean1
title: Weekend break
text: The location is great, very close to the Arc de Triomphe and the bus tours start point. I accept that the room we had was small but very clean. The bedding was crisp white and the bed was comfy. The staff were excellent and very helpful and if you wanted taxis etc they would get you one straight away. Nothing was too much trouble. Does the room size really matter as you are only sleeping in it after all. We were out early in a morning and came back in late so it didn't matter for us. I would use it again.
